mapper.select: select id, create_date, create_user, delete_flag, remark, update_date, update_user, base_order_node_id, name, desc, default_value, empty, edit, type, value_type, data_sources, relation_id from sys_order_node_field where delete_flag = 0 and id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_order_node_field( id, create_date, create_user, delete_flag, remark, update_date, update_user, base_order_node_id, name, desc, default_value, empty, edit, type, value_type, data_sources, relation_id) values (#{id}, #{createDate}, #{createUser}, #{deleteFlag}, #{remark}, #{updateDate}, #{updateUser}, #{baseOrderNodeId}, #{name}, #{desc}, #{defaultValue}, #{empty}, #{edit}, #{type}, #{valueType}, #{dataSources}, #{relationId})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from sys_order_node_field where delete_flag = 0
and ${item.name} ${item.symbol} #{item.data}
